message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $999000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and rarity.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your desire to save, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $975000. This is a fair compromise considering the product's value and rarity. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $960000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.

I understand your desire to save, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $970000. This is as low as I'm willing to go. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $965000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
